table.name: vtiger_exactonline
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonline` ( `exactonlineid` INT(11) default NULL, 'exactrecordno' INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, 'exactrecordname' VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 'exactonlinereturn' VARCHAR(1000), PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_exactonlinecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonlinecf` ( `exactonlineid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_exactonline_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonline_settings` ( `exactonlineid` int(11) NOT NULL, 'exactauthurl' VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'https://start.exactonline.nl/api/oauth2/auth', 'exacttokenurl' VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'https://start.exactonline.nl/api/oauth2/token', 'exactclientid' VARCHAR(255), 'exactsecret' VARCHAR(255), 'exactreturnurl' VARCHAR(255), 'access_token' VARCHAR(1000), 'refresh_token' VARCHAR(1000), 'exactrefreshedtime' VARCHAR(255), 'exactdivision' INT(10), PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
